name: v1.4.3
body:
## Using bzlmod with Bazel 6 or later:

1. Add `common --enable_bzlmod` to `.bazelrc`.

2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_oci", version = "1.4.3")
# For testing, we also recommend https://registry.bazel.build/modules/container_structure_test

oci = use_extension("@rules_oci//oci:extensions.bzl", "oci")

# Declare external images you need to pull, for example: 
oci.pull(
    name = "distroless_base",
    # 'latest' is not reproducible, but it's convenient.
    # During the build we print a WARNING message that includes recommended 'digest' and 'platforms'
    # values which you can use here in place of 'tag' to pin for reproducibility.
    tag = "latest",
    image = "gcr.io/distroless/base",
    platforms = ["linux/amd64"],
)

# For each oci.pull call, repeat the "name" here to expose them as dependencies.
use_repo(oci, "distroless_base")
```

## Using WORKSPACE:

```starlark

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_oci",
    sha256 = "d41d0ba7855f029ad0e5ee35025f882cbe45b0d5d570842c52704f7a47ba8668",
    strip_prefix = "rules_oci-1.4.3",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/releases/download/v1.4.3/rules_oci-v1.4.3.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_oci//oci:dependencies.bzl", "rules_oci_dependencies")

rules_oci_dependencies()

load("@rules_oci//oci:repositories.bzl", "LATEST_CRANE_VERSION", "oci_register_toolchains")

oci_register_toolchains(
    name = "oci",
    crane_version = LATEST_CRANE_VERSION,
    # Uncommenting the zot toolchain will cause it to be used instead of crane for some tasks.
    # Note that it does not support docker-format images.
    # zot_version = LATEST_ZOT_VERSION,
)

# You can pull your base images using oci_pull like this:
load("@rules_oci//oci:pull.bzl", "oci_pull")

oci_pull(
    name = "distroless_base",
    digest = "sha256:ccaef5ee2f1850270d453fdf700a5392534f8d1a8ca2acda391fbb6a06b81c86",
    image = "gcr.io/distroless/base",
    platforms = [
        "linux/amd64",
        "linux/arm64",
    ],
)
```


## What's Changed
* fix: make crane use storage directory by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/423


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/compare/v1.4.2...v1.4.3

## What's Changed
* chore(fmt): pre-commit[buildifier] by @tx-chen in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/376
* feat: add custom no_match_error to oci_alias by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/364
* refactor: clean up variables and messages by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/362
* oci_tarball: set mtime to 2000-01-01 by @gergelyfabian in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/380
* Revert "oci_tarball: set mtime to 2000-01-01" by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/383
* fix: prevent failure if no fixed_args provided by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/397
* chore: enable some CI on macos again by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/390
* chore: avoid generated deltas in code review by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/400
* chore: turn off more MacOS testing by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/399
* Update ci.yaml by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/398
* fix: forward well known attributes to macro expanded targets (#370) by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/392
* feat: add Snowflake's registries support for oci_pull by @sfc-gh-dszot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/379
* refactor: simplify repotags processing by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/401
* Support tar files for multi-arch images by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/325
* fix: fixed go and rust doc  by @liningpan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/402

* @tx-chen made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/376
* @gergelyfabian made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/380
* @sfc-gh-dszot made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/379
* @illicitonion made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/401
* @liningpan made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/402

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/compare/v1.4.0...v1.4.1

## What's Changed
* feat: use link instead of copy for blobs in oci_image_index by @hunshcn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/359

* docs: oci_push authorization by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/363
* fix: Propagate all tags, not just well known ones by @ajaypbrt in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/366
* refactor: make download_manifest return digest by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/367
* refactor: stop using jq for stamping by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/371
* chore(docs): recommend apko by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/374
* fix: add variant to manifest entry  by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/368

## What's Changed
* feat: provide the sha256 digest as an oci_image target by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/346

* example: make sure capital letter targets work by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/356
* Fix invalid tarball manifest creation by @mboulton-fathom in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/326

```starlark
)
```

```starlark
# You can pull your base images using oci_pull like this:
```

name: v1.3.1
body:
## Using bzlmod with Bazel 6 or later:

1. Add `common --enable_bzlmod` to `.bazelrc`.

2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_oci", version = "1.3.1")
# For testing, we also recommend https://registry.bazel.build/modules/container_structure_test

oci = use_extension("@rules_oci//oci:extensions.bzl", "oci")

# Declare external images you need to pull, for example: 
oci.pull(
    name = "distroless_base",
    # 'latest' is not reproducible, but it's convenient.
    # During the build we print a WARNING message that includes recommended 'digest' and 'platforms'
    # values which you can use here in place of 'tag' to pin for reproducibility.
    tag = "latest",
    image = "gcr.io/distroless/base",
    platforms = ["linux/amd64"],
)

# For each oci.pull call, repeat the "name" here to expose them as dependencies.
use_repo(oci, "distroless_base")
```

## Using WORKSPACE:

```starlark
)

rules_oci_dependencies()

load("@rules_oci//oci:repositories.bzl", "LATEST_CRANE_VERSION", "LATEST_ZOT_VERSION", "oci_register_toolchains")

oci_register_toolchains(
    name = "oci",
    crane_version = LATEST_CRANE_VERSION,
    # Uncommenting the zot toolchain will cause it to be used instead of crane for some tasks.
    # Note that it does not support docker-format images.
    # zot_version = LATEST_ZOT_VERSION,
)

# You can pull your base images using oci_pull like this:
load("@rules_oci//oci:pull.bzl", "oci_pull")

oci_pull(
    name = "distroless_base",
    digest = "sha256:ccaef5ee2f1850270d453fdf700a5392534f8d1a8ca2acda391fbb6a06b81c86",
    image = "gcr.io/distroless/base",
    platforms = [
        "linux/amd64",
        "linux/arm64",
    ],
)
```


## What's Changed
* chore: smoke test includes a pull by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/332
* fix(bzlmod): print working MODULE.bazel reproducibility instructions by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/317

* Remove '"' from path in MANIFEST_DIGEST when creating a tar file by @rbielak in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/278

name: v0.5.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:

```starlark

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_oci",
    sha256 = "1c4730c85b90e793679ec534d47878bc19ecc267e43b21cf050081c7fe025af7",
    strip_prefix = "rules_oci-0.5.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/releases/download/v0.5.0/rules_oci-v0.5.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_oci//oci:dependencies.bzl", "rules_oci_dependencies")

rules_oci_dependencies()

load("@rules_oci//oci:repositories.bzl", "LATEST_CRANE_VERSION", "LATEST_ZOT_VERSION", "oci_register_toolchains")

oci_register_toolchains(
    name = "oci",
    crane_version = LATEST_CRANE_VERSION,
    # Uncommenting the zot toolchain will cause it to be used instead of crane for some tasks.
    # Note that it does not support docker-format images.
    # zot_version = LATEST_ZOT_VERSION,
)

# Optional, for oci_tarball rule
load("@rules_pkg//:deps.bzl", "rules_pkg_dependencies")

rules_pkg_dependencies()
```
